pages.text: Firon Tools are highly durable and efficient.$(br)When a block is destroyed, they are able to melt it down, losing some of their durability, and upon impact, they are able to set fire to living creatures susceptible to fire.$(br)Firon Sword, with enough durability, is able to lose some of it and launch a fire charge in the direction of your swing, after which it will need time before using this ability again. The Firon Multi-Tool combines all Firon Tools with their abilities and is capable of launching a whole volley of fire charges.

Can be crafted on Lithum Altar, using $(#ea7f17)$(l)200 000 DE$() and following items:$(li)Netherite Sword$(o) [Main]$()$(li)Firon Ingot $(o)[x4]$()$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)2000 DRP$()
